    Description
    CampManager
    The CampManager class holds all logic for the creation and handling of camps and is the intermediary between the dao and the app logic.
    EnquiryManager
    The EnquiryManager class serves as a DB and abstracts the Data Access Object implementations and provides what's necessary for others to be used for enquiries

    SuggestionManager
    The SuggestionManager class abstracts the relevant suggestion operations CampCommitteeMember/staff can use.
